Abstract: This paper explores the evolution of construction robotics from automation to advanced human–robot collaboration. By integrating sensing technologies and industrial robots, the construction industry is witnessing a transformative shift towards more efficient and precise building processes. The paper discusses the latest advancements in construction robotics, emphasizing the role of architecture in designing robot-friendly environments. It also highlights the importance of human–robot collaboration, which not only enhances productivity but also addresses safety and skill shortages. Through a review of recent studies and case studies, the paper provides insights into the future of construction robotics, where robots and humans work together seamlessly to achieve higher levels of performance and innovation.
